p: The fact that the association between high temperatures and mortality is established at lag 1, i.e. a very short-term effect, is in line both with the biological mechanisms implicated, namely the quickness of onset and lethality of cardiovascular diseases in the elderly ( Havenith, 2002), and the results yielded by other studies ( Alberdi et al., 1998, Diaz et al., 2015).
